Blog.post: sorry...so busy lately...haven't much time to drool in front of my pc..well there's an upcoming concert for our dancetroupe this coming november, but we're practicing like there's no concert...i'm sure well cram.. drool!*_* their not taking it seriously..so sad..

sorry...so busy lately...haven't much time to drool in front of my pc..well there's an upcoming concert for our dancetroupe this coming november, but we're practicing like there's no concert...i'm sure well cram.. drool!*_* their not taking it seriously..so sad..

so far, my life is as normal as before... my friend and I , agreed to call monday and saturday our day-off for practice..that agreement helped me so much. Now I got a tym to do all the duty as a real student who goes to school to study..not just dance..he he ehe.:) toay is sunday I attended NSTP in intramuros,Manila .. I'm happy 'coz I saw two of my highschool friend in the mall..we chatted...like there is nio tromorrow..i'm very happy!:) peace out!

Here I am AGAIN ! as of now...nothing special has happened.Today is just an ordinary day for me..go to school..jot down notes in class..listen to the boring prof...eat lunch..meet and talk with friends..nothing very amusing...in short I'm BORED! Im thinking of doing something other than dancing.. i want to try new other things, that I have not tried before...the problem is...I'm so busy to even think of s omething for myself...I dont know what to do im so confused..

tonight! i arrived at home at nearly 10:00 ..argh!!! the ride on the bus evryday, is really pissing me off! the traffic..the noise...evrything!!!! when i went home my friends are already eating the dishes my mom made.My day was very pleasant: i went to school 15 minutes before class, i've gotten enough tym to prepare for my powerpoint report on my comtech subject. i reported well...i posed beautifully in our organization picture taking...and at home i blew my bday candle in my cake while whispering my wish for this year..and guess wat it is?.... NOT TO TAKE MATH AGAIN IN THE NEXT TERM!!! ! ahh!!! MATH over here Math over there MATH everywhere! don't know whats gotten into me to pick a progran that has a lot of MATH in it? i love computers..yes...very much..that's why i've chosen computer science! but hey..math is 5 units?! hello?! i hated math eversince it was introduced to me! argh!!! help me GOD ! please?

it's august 13! and i just turned seventeen! what a day.a while ago i have discussed a topic 'bout computer in front of the class..and oh! it's really great, i felt the urge to boost my confidence as i step up front!! wat a day wat a day..
i just finished creating a presentation using my powerpoint...it was not the best but i think it is acceptable...for my prof...atleast...don't worry i'll do better nxt tym! chao! ;`
